urls.description: The coronavirus that is causing a global havoc by unleashing COVID-19 (19 is for the year found) disease has a millennium dome like structure with protein struts projecting from a dome like fatty layer. Having gene inside, it doesn’t produce energy like bacteria. It replicates inside the cell. It can spread by human touch or by aerosol in the air. womenspowerbook.org that offers a 150 subject encyclopaedia brings you this story on the novel coronavirus
